description.value:
While wearing this amulet, you can take a Magic|XPHB action to name a location that you are familiar with on another plane of existence. Then make a DC 15 Intelligence (Arcana|XPHB) check. On a successful check, you cast Plane Shift|XPHB. On a failed check, you and each creature and object within 15 feet of you travel to a random destination determined by rolling 1d100 and consulting the following table.

Attunement: true

_srdData.name: Amulet of the Planes
entries: While wearing this amulet, you can take a {@action Magic|XPHB} action to name a location that you are familiar with on another plane of existence. Then make a {@dc 15} Intelligence ({@skill Arcana|XPHB}) check. On a successful check, you cast {@spell Plane Shift|XPHB}. On a failed check, you and each creature and object within 15 feet of you travel to a random destination determined by rolling {@dice 1d100} and consulting the following table.

rows: Random location on the plane you named

Random location on an Inner Plane determined by rolling {@dice 1d6}: on a {@b 1}, the Plane of Air; on a {@b 2}, the Plane of Earth; on a {@b 3}, the Plane of Fire; on a {@b 4}, the Plane of Water; on a {@b 5}, the Feywild; on a {@b 6}, the Shadowfell

Random location on an Outer Plane determined by rolling 1d8: on a {@b 1}, Arborea; on a {@b 2}, Arcadia; on a {@b 3}, the Beastlands; on a {@b 4}, Bytopia; on a {@b 5}, Elysium; on a {@b 6}, Mechanus; on a {@b 7}, Mount Celestia; on an {@b 8}, Ysgard

Random location on an Outer Plane determined by rolling {@dice 1d8}: on a {@b 1}, the Abyss; on a {@b 2}, Acheron; on a {@b 3}, Carceri; on a {@b 4}, Gehenna; on a {@b 5}, Hades; on a {@b 6}, Limbo; on a {@b 7}, the Nine Hells; on an {@b 8}, Pandemonium
Random location on the Astral Plane
